description_for_human: Get accurate, AI-enhanced weather forecasts with hyper-local predictions, pollen tracking, and weather alerts.
description_for_model: Rainz Weather is an AI-powered weather application that provides hyper-local weather forecasts using multi-model ensemble predictions. It aggregates data from ECMWF, GFS, Met.no, WeatherAPI, Tomorrow.io, and Open-Meteo, then processes through AI for enhanced accuracy. Features include: real-time weather, hourly/daily forecasts, severe weather alerts, pollen tracking, air quality, UV index, precipitation radar, gamified weather predictions with leaderboards, and an AI Weather Companion chat. Available as a free Progressive Web App at rainz.net with optional Rainz+ premium subscription for ad-free experience and extended features.
